name: Suggy
description:
Game made in 12 days for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.

You play as a sugar cube called Suggy that fell out the sugar bowl and now have to run to sweeten your tea. Collect sugar lumps to get bigger and avoid falling into milk.

This game is my first game and a lot of it I learned during this game jam. For now it's just a few ideas that i believe can be fun. Maybe I'll come back to make it into a real game at some point.

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use A and D or arrow keys to move.
  • Use Space to jump.

Art and programming by Harry

Songs by Canola and Gabs
